sentence: Stepan Company ( SCL ) will begin trading ex-dividend on May 29, 2013.
A cash dividend payment of $0.16 per share is scheduled to be paid on June 14, 2013.
Shareholders who purchased SCL stock prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This represents an -42.86% decrease from the same period a year ago.
At the current stock price of $54.47, the dividend yield is 1.17%.
The previous trading day's last sale of SCL was $54.47, representing a -16.19% decrease from the 52 week high of $64.99 and a 27.5% increase over the 52 week low of $42.72.
SCL is a part of the Basic Industries sector, which includes companies such as Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) and Unilever PLC ( UL ).
SCL's current earnings per share, an indicator of a company's profitability, is $3.35.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the SCL Dividend History page.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
